title: (x) Sans on New York Times op-ed page - Corporate S {Jakob}
content:
Did anyone see [this](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015164512/http:/static.flickr.com/31/50517058_efa825986d_b.jpg) on the op-ed page of yesterday's New York Times?

There's a really nice sans-serif with ranging numerals and small caps. ( [Detail here.](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015164512/http:/static.flickr.com/25/50520116_530fc26814_o.gif)) Anyone know what it is?

(This was an "op-chart", so I don't think it has to follow standard NYT style.)
author: bshaykin

comments.content: It looks to me like [Corporate S](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015164512/http:/www.urwpp.de/cgi-bin1/dalcgi/deutsch/schnellsuche.htd?searchchar=corporate) by Kurt Weidemann.
